item.title: [PI] pk points are not working [will Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

how about on the death… get the other players id and give them pts…

Its how delta does it…

				client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
				killerz.ResetAttack();
				if (playerName != killerz.lastKilled) {
				}
				if(isinsafewild() == false && attacknpc <= 0){
					if (KillerId != playerId) {
						killerz.sM("I downed "+playerName+"... You gain 3 Pts for Killing a player Inside wilderness");

				if (playerLastConnect != killerz.playerLastConnect) {
					if (playerName != killerz.lastKilled) {
						killerz.rating += 3;
						if (killerz.playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419) {
							stillgfx(444, absY, absX);
						}
						killerz.lastKilled = playerName;
					} else {
						sM("Although you have killed him recently");
					}
				} else {
					sM("Although he has the same ip address as you. Sorry No pts");
				}
					}
					if(killerz != null) {
						if(playerRights < 3) {
							if(tradeTimer == 0) {
								youdied();
							}
						}
					}
				}

Not fully sure the code for PI but i mean this should teach you the concept.
